import Square from'./Square';//主棋盘组件
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Board(_ref){let{xIsNext,squares,onPlay}=_ref;function handleClick(i){if(calculateWinner(squares).winner||squares[i]){return;}const nextSquares=squares.slice();nextSquares[i]=xIsNext?'X':'O';onPlay(nextSquares);}const{winner,line}=calculateWinner(squares);let status;if(winner){status='Winner: '+winner;}else{status='Next player: '+(xIsNext?'X':'O');}const renderSquare=i=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Square,{value:squares[i],onSquareClick:()=>handleClick(i),isWinner:line&&line.includes(i)});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"status",children:status}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"board-row",children:[renderSquare(0),renderSquare(1),renderSquare(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"board-row",children:[renderSquare(3),renderSquare(4),renderSquare(5)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"board-row",children:[renderSquare(6),renderSquare(7),renderSquare(8)]})]});}function calculateWinner(squares){const lines=[[0,1,2],[3,4,5],[6,7,8],[0,3,6],[1,4,7],[2,5,8],[0,4,8],[2,4,6]];for(let i=0;i<lines.length;i++){const[a,b,c]=lines[i];if(squares[a]&&squares[a]===squares[b]&&squares[a]===squares[c]){return{winner:squares[a],line:lines[i]};}}return{winner:null,line:null};}
